page.title: 14Transport - Mattingley Area.
page.content: Apart from the busy Hook/Reading & Hartley Wintney/Reading roads which cross the block, the area is mainly quiet rural lanes. Transport is largely{private cars}going to or from work, to the shops or just travelling through the area. The other main form of transport is the{lorry}(the Hook/Reading road being an unofficial link between the M3 at Hook & the M4 at Reading!) The nearest railway stations are at Hook & Winchfield (both outside the block). The only{bus services}are the once a week 206 & 333 along the Hook/Reading road, operated by Hampshire Bus Co. of Basingstoke & the 411 & 412 which are run hourly along the Hartley Wintney/Reading Road (across Hazeley Heath) by the Alder Valley Bus Co. of Aldershot.
